title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Transformational Learning Design Through Presence Formation in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Through four or more structured reflection activities, learners can critically analyze their nursing experiences
Learners can explain the importance of presence in patient-centered communication through peer feedback and instructor-guided reflection.
Learners can present new perspectives by documenting three or more transformative learning cases after simulation practice.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
